item.title: Simple Look at Laravel Events
item.description: Events Getting Started This is part of a larger Laravel Guide I am working on in this case the example is in the Events folder Start the example php artisan serve --port=8081 Then visit http://localhost:8081/example1 So if you look in app/routes.php You see route example1 will fire and event and there are two listeners Do they run async or sync If you hit that route you see the sleep taking effect so it is syncronous
